article_text:
Larry and the former Barb Ruth were married March 18, 1955, in Emmanual Lutheran Church in Hermantown.

Their children are Kathy and Rick Johnson and Dave and Terri Huttel, all of Island Lake; Connie and Paul Richardson of Redlands, Calif.; and the late Duane (Julie) Huttel of Hermantown .

They have five grandchildren and one great-grandchild.

Larry retired as a quality control inspector for the Air National Guard's 148th Fighter Wing in Duluth. Barb retired from State Farm Insurance.

Secret to staying married: Just love each other and spend time together.

article_summary:
Larry and the former Barb Ruth were married March 18, 1955, in Emmanual Lutheran Church in Hermantown.
Their children are Kathy and Rick Johnson and Dave and Terri Huttel, all of Island Lake; Connie and Paul Richardson of Redlands, Calif.; and the late Duane (Julie) Huttel of Hermantown .
Barb retired from State Farm Insurance.
Secret to staying married: Just love each other and spend time together.
Larry retired as a quality control inspector for the Air National Guard's 148th Fighter Wing in Duluth.
